name: aws/aws-sdk-php
description: AWS SDK for PHP - Use Amazon Web Services in your PHP project

suggest.doctrine/cache: Adds support for caching of credentials and responses
suggest.ext-apc: Allows service description opcode caching, request and response caching, and credentials caching
suggest.ext-openssl: Allows working with CloudFront private distributions and verifying received SNS messages
suggest.monolog/monolog: Adds support for logging HTTP requests and responses
suggest.symfony/yaml: Eases the ability to write manifests for creating jobs in AWS Import/Export
